setup.description: Starts the initial setup for the XP bot.
setup.title: Setup Wizard
setup.startPrompt:
Welcome to the XP Bot setup wizard.

This wizard will set the log channel for level-ups and the cooldown time required to earn text XP.

Do you want to continue?
setup.askChannel: Please **mention the text channel** (e.g., #levels) where level-up messages should be sent.
setup.invalidChannel: That is not a valid text channel. Setup cancelled.
setup.askCooldown:
Set the Message (Text) XP cooldown. (Recommended: {{default}} seconds).
‚ÑπÔ∏è **Note:** Voice XP is independent and awarded automatically every 2.5 minutes.
setup.invalidCooldown: That is not a valid number (minimum 10s). Setup cancelled.
setup.success: Setup complete! The bot is now active.
setup.testMessage: {{user}} {{channel}} was successfully set (This is a test message)
setup.testMessageError: I set the log channel, but I couldn't send the test message. Please check my permissions in that channel.
